Message.Title: som Wall Street firms flee high tax NY
Message.Msg: The city’s hedge-fund executives are flying south — and it’s not for vacation. An increasing number of financial firms, especially private equity and hedge funds, are fed up with New York’s sky-high city and state tax rates and are relocating to the business-friendly climate in Florida’s Palm Beach County. Selfish rich bums they are. What a ridiculous notion fleeing high taxes for lower taxes.

Topic.Title: som Wall Street firms flee high tax NY

Message.Msg: Great! Hope they all leave!

Topic.Title: som Wall Street firms flee high tax NY

Message.Msg: Same thing happening in Calif. Sales tax at 10%. Figure what you pay on large items like a car. State tax going up for 2013. Many businesses moving to Nevada or Arizona. Jobs going with them. Dem politicians cutting off their foot to spite their leg. Inflation increasing but let's raise taxes to save the programs that put us into to debt in the first place. Sound reasoning.
